title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 64.5 - Importation for immediate slaughter
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 64.5 - Importation for immediate slaughter

State Regulations

The provisions of the foregoing sections of this Part
notwithstanding, any horse or other equid may be imported for immediate
slaughter, and only for such purpose, without a health certificate or negative
test for equine infectious anemia, by making application to the Commissioner of

Agriculture and Markets and by complying with the provisions set forth in an
application agreement required by the commissioner prior to
importation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
64.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
